QA.Answer: All members of the Brown community are welcome!
QA.Question: Who is the conference intended for?

QA.Answer: Please subscribe to the mailing list and we will email you with instructions when we open submissions
QA.Question: How do I submit an abstract?

QA.Answer: The conference will take place on Crowdcast. Instructions and links will be sent out prior to the conference.
QA.Question: How are you streaming the conference?

QA.Answer: The conference is free for all members of the Brown community.
QA.Question: Is there a registration fee?
